short_term: Xavier has recently shown interest in blockchain and crypto, overhearing conversations in the hallway and reading about trading. He's also expressed a desire to work in finance, specifically quant trading, and has secured a summer internship at Jane Street through nepotism.

Complete a project using Ethereum or another blockchain platform to showcase his skills

projected_long: Become a recognized expert in quant trading and blockchain technology, potentially starting his own venture or joining a high-profile firm.

projected_long: Develop a stable and supportive network of friends and romantic partners, reflecting his growth and independence.
